text:
Perfect! I have successfully removed the redundant "Research & Education Use" badge from the footer. 

## ✅ **Footer Simplified Successfully**

### **Before:**
```
VisibleDx v1.0 - Educational Tool
© 2024 Willem Gielen MD - MIT License • For Healthcare Education Only • Research & Education Use
```

### **After:**
```
VisibleDx v1.0 - Educational Tool
© 2024 Willem Gielen MD - MIT License • For Healthcare Education Only
```

The footer is now cleaner and more concise, eliminating the redundancy between "For Healthcare Education Only" and "Research & Education Use" while maintaining all the essential information:

- Version and tool type
- Copyright and license information  
- Clear educational-only purpose statement

The footer now provides the same information more efficiently without the repetitive messaging.
